name: Coloring Pixels - Flag Pack
detailed_description:
Flags Book

This Flag themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Inspired by flags from across the globe, expect flags from interesting countries, states and other origins.

Contents

The Flags book unlocks the following images:
  • Pride - 20x12
  • Antwerp - 24x16
  • Olympic - 53x30
  • South Africa - 53x31
  • Jolly Roger - 60x45
  • Hawaii - 64x32
  • United Kingdom - 70x35
  • Lifeguard Flags - 72x152
  • United Nations - 79x55
  • UNSC Founders - 92x41
  • Zimbabwe - 100x49
  • Nepal - 100x100
  • US Virgin Islands - 129x75
  • Kingdom of Burundi - 149x99
  • FIAV - 169x100
  • Kiribati - 200x100
  • Wales - 200x120
  • Royal Standard - 300x150
  • European Union - 320x320
  • Republic of Venice - 400x202

short_description: This Flag themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Inspired by flags from across the globe, expect flags from interesting countries, states and other origins.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Nvidia GTX970
  • Processor: Intel i7 7700k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
